Victorian House Museum- an 1866 Victorian Home recreating a family dwelling of the period. The Museum also features frequently changing exhibits of artifacts and collections pertaining to local history, Society office, research library, gift shop, and the Society's collections of artifacts and clothing. Open Monday through Friday, 10AM-2PM. Closed Saturday, Sunday, and major holidays. Admission $2 adult, $1 child, free to Society members. Group tours by appointment.

701 East Washington Street
Belleville, Illinois 62220
Phone: (618) 234-0600
Fax: (618) 234-3060

content=a local gem - great food and lots of choices, all served by a friendly and welcoming staff. Usually packed on the weekends, so go early.
